mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FRboardRp(FRboardrpNum, content,boardNum, memberNum,cmoimCode) VALUES (seq_FRboardRp.NEXTVAL,#{content},#{boardNum},#{memberNum},#{cmoimCode})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM FRboardRp WHERE boardNum=#{boardNum}

SELECT FRboardrpNum, fb.BOARDNUM, fbrp.content, TO_CHAR(fbrp.created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created, fb.CMOIMCODE, m.MEMBERNUM,m.name, NVL(fb.boardNum, 0) boardNumCount FROM FRboardRp fbrp JOIN FREEBOARD fb ON fbrp.BOARDNUM = fb.boardNum JOIN member2 m ON fbrp.memberNum = m.memberNum WHERE fb.boardNum = #{boardNum} ORDER BY FRboardrpNum DESC
